root.name: Jackie Chan Adventures
root.description: Based on the popular kids' show with the same name, Jackie Chan Adventures is an action styled adventure game that follows Jackie Chan and his young niece while they search the world for 12 ancient artifacts. After being deployed as a special agent for the government, secret "Section 13", Jackie is sent by his uncle to recover 12 artifacts spread out all over the globe, all while fighting off ancient Chinese demons and thugs. In order to safely do this, you have an array of different classic Jackie Chan moves at your disposal. These include running up walls, throwing enemies, and all of Jackie's explicit kung fu styled fighting.
